medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Presented with 1.5 weeks of jaundice and had RUQ pains the day prior to admission that have since resolved. Experienced a single episode of blood-streaked emesis the day prior to admission, with the amount described as less than 1 teaspoon.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Adrenal insufficiency, seizure disorder, bradycardia status post pacemaker placement, transient ischemic attack (TIA), dementia, aspiration pneumonia
